data.name: Dwarves Craft. Father's home
data.detailed_description:
Cory, a craftsdwarf, has moved to his aging father to help him take care of and restore their home and its surroundings!

150 colored picross puzzles of varied difficulty, a gripping story, charming music - all this together will let you spend your free time in a fun and enticing way! A great opportunity to challenge yourself by solving puzzles!

Complete levels, solve puzzles and help the dwarves restore their old home!

- 150 unforgettable colorful levels!
- vibrant graphics!
- repair the house!
- an exciting journey!
- bright Summer-like colors!
- a great way to train your logical and abstract thinking!
- easy-to-use UI and engaging gameplay!

data.short_description: Dwarves Craft - Father's Home - reveal the hidden pictures! 150 engaging levels for all ages!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7 Windows 8, Windows 10 (x86 and x64)
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 480 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 480 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.6
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 480 MB available space
